I'm a Web Developer

About

I am a results-driven Front-End Web Developer with expertise in Shopify and a strong focus on responsive and mobile-first web design. With a background in front-end development, I have effectively customized Shopify themes, leveraged Liquid template language, and integrated third-party apps to create visually appealing and high-performing e-commerce websites. My commitment to user-friendly design and meticulous attention to detail has contributed to enhanced user experiences and increased online sales.

My proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, coupled with a keen eye for design, enables me to implement responsive design techniques, ensuring seamless functionality across various devices. I am well-versed in web performance optimization, cross-browser compatibility, and web accessibility standards.
